theme.title: Area of interest - summary by subthemes
theme.txt: To help disentangle the potential impacts of restoration at each candidate site, we report the individual benefits, costs, and risks (i.e., constraints) in finer detail below.
theme.disclaimer: The dashboard needs to be computed first.

description.0: For each assessed benefit, the mean value over the considered AOI is displayed in its original units (for example, C tons/ha). Value will be using the SI prefixes if the value is not readable in the original unit.
description.1: For any of these thematic layers, if you have used your own data in the model, make sure that you provided the correct information.

description.0: The tool includes data on two types of costs: opportunity costs, and implementation costs. Please refer to our manual for more information.
description.1: For each cost, the sum value over the considered AOI is displayed in its original units (for example, C tons/ha). Value will be using the SI prefixes if the value is not readable in the original unit.
description.2: Note: Information on the variability of natural regeneration success is included in the 'Constraints' category.

description.0: Results indicate the percentage of the total area of the region of interest that is subject to each particular constraint (i.e., is excluded from restoration).
